# remove(at:)

**Instance Method**

Removes and returns the anchor at the specified position.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func remove(at index: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **index**: The position of the anchor to remove. Use a valid index of the collection.

## Removing anchors

- **remove(_:)**: Removes the anchor at the specified position.
- **removeAll()**: Removes all anchors from the collection.
- **removeAll(keepCapacity:)**: Removes all anchors from the collection.
